Shadow Cat wouldn't be able to hear Prowl's thoughts to Iron Raptor 
unless she was in the whole Matrix deal, which she wasn't. Anything 
enclosed in --'s in my posts is 'thought speach', and Shadow Cat and 
Snow Tech (and anyone else) wouldn't even know it was going on, much 
less hear it. Prowl and Iron Raptor share sparks in a way, and with 
through that share emotions and thoughts.


::Prowl::

Prowl calmly watches Shadow Cat trip over Snow Tech and then yell at 
him. He looks over at Angel Prime as the bot drives up.

"I.." he begins, when he hears Snow Tech's comment. His eyes narrow as 
he turns his head toward the new bot. He feels the anger flare up in 
him. This new body was very eager for battle, and seemed to preffer 
the more raging emotions.

"No," he says in a calm and deadly voice as he takes a step toward 
Snow Tech, "_I_ am Iron's lover, and if you have a problem with that, 
there's a simple way to work it out."

His wing guns level themselves with Snow Tech's head and chest (two 
missile launchers and two rapid-fire laser guns). Prowl had just 
challenged the bot to a duel.

The sound of laughter reaches his audio receptors, but Prowl's 
attention was focused on this new bot. His wing orbs probe the area, 
picking up Aerotaur's position and keeping track of all the other 
bots. He'd be aware of anymovement.

-What in the pit is this maniac talking about?- He thinks to Iron 
Raptor, keeping his eyes on Snow Tech.

"Take your hand off her. Now," Prowl orders. If the bot didn't 
comply... Well, good Christmas ornaments were always welcome.

Prowl could almost hope that Snow Tech would rebel. That way Prowl 
could test this new body....




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...>
